backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing user profiles, ads, reward requests, and UPI ID features with access control and state maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old stored records to include new optional UPI ID fields in user profiles and reward requests.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to UPI ID and payout‑copy updates with associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend components, hooks, types, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, and routing between user and admin dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdManageme: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting ads with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Displays platform analytics stats such as user count, total points, and reward requests.
frontend/src/components/admin/PayoutMana: Shows pending reward requests and allows admins to approve or reject them.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with login/logout, theme toggle, user info, and admin indicator.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile creation with name and optional UPI ID input.
Lists ads for users to watch and awards points after viewing with a dialog preview.
frontend/src/components/user/RewardsSect: Lets users redeem rewards, manage UPI IDs, and view reward request statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing it on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, UPI ID, admin check, active ads, ad watching, and placeholder reward queries using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and layout styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders an admin dashboard with tabs for analytics, ad management, and payout management sections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays a marketing landing page with feature highlights and a login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: Shows the user dashboard with profile points, active ads, and rewards tabs populated via query hooks.
frontend/src/types/rewards.ts: Defines reward-related types including RewardStatus and the RewardRequest interface.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and new feature requests for adding UPI payout support to an ad‑watching platform.
